channel.title: Freeze when leveling up
channel.description: On the server source "Pk-Planet" the client freezes when someone levels up. Is there a way to fix this?

item.title: Freeze when leveling up
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

just search for You've just advanced a Thieving level

then Delete The sendFrame164(4261);

Then Its fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Freeze when leveling up
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:8, topic:350734”][quote author=huiho link=topic=447089.msg3281955#msg3281955 date=1279931655]

On the server source “Pk-Planet” the client freezes when someone levels up. Is there a way to fix this?

Yes.

if you find why it freezes and fix the problem…

1st of all… When you leech, people play that same server on everyone else’s server. And if you need help fixing the problem, ask the owner of the server. Heres his msn: georgerawr@hotmal.com

Hope this helped…

If you don’t have anything useful to say here, don’t say it at all.

Ontopic:
Is there any message that comes in run.bat when this occurs? If so, post it here.

There is no command prompt that appears when you open the client…
[/quote]

hes talking about your server prompt.[/quote]

Nothing appears on my server prompt. It just shows that after a few seconds, the player disconnects.

case 17: // '\021' changeText126("@dre@Congratulations! You've just advanced a Thieving level!", 4263); changeText126((new StringBuilder()).append("You have now reached level ").append(getLevelForXP(playerXP[i])). append("!").toString(), 4264); sendFrame164(4261); if (playerLevel[17] == 99) { itemMessage("Congratulations, Your Thieving level is now 99!", "Speak to Bob at Home for a skill cape of achievement.", 2710, 250); maxedStats += 1; } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Freeze when leveling up
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Probably an easy fix.

Just search for

Congratulations, you just advanced a

and delete the sendFrame126 lines/NpcDialogue lines from the level up cases.

Read full topic
